long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Expin.me enables everyone who is a Writer, a Photographer, an Artist, a Traveler, a hiker or any kind of hobbies or individuals who have Social and Political views. If you are one of them or aiming to be  one among them, this is the place to start your journey. 

You start with following your interest areas  and then either create a story or explore stories from other individuals. Here are some of the salient features of Expin.me:

1. Publish Stories:   You Curate Stories using Expin.me Story Builder. It has just the right amount of customization to make your stories look beautiful and colorful, which  represent you. The simplicity in its drag and drop  interface gets you started in minutes. Once published you can share your story on social channels or embed on you website.

2. Read Stories: Your stories get viewership with Expin.me user community based on interest areas of story readers at several interactions and providing your story. As story reader you can also  usie Expin.me Mobile App. 

3. Getting Popular: A good story gets promoted based on readers engagement, hence increases your popularity. As you gain popularity among our community, you would be automatically upgraded to Elite StoryTeller. It gets you more visibility and personal branding among our rapidly growing readers base. 

4. Storytelling in  a Group:  You have an option to create or join interest groups that are either Open and Closed Groups. In addition, Secret Groups enable them to share experiences with closed ones

All of this begins by starting to express your first story on Expin.me. 

Expin.me is free for individuals and groups. We are also have early adopter program(Alpha) for Businesses and Larger Communities which is a paid subscription model.
